copy.title: FAQ examples - Clickeen
copy.description: Real-world FAQ examples for every industry.

copy.headline: Real problems. Solved instantly.
copy.subheadline: See how the world's best brands use Clickeen to answer questions.

copy.headline: Hotels & Accommodations
copy.body: Don't let 'What's the wifi?' block your front desk. Automate check-in details and parking info so guests serve themselves.

copy.headline: Restaurants & Dining
copy.body: Dietary questions handled instantly. Put allergen info right on your guests' phones so your staff can focus on service.

copy.headline: Vacation Rentals
copy.subheadline: The manual that never gets lost.
copy.body: Check-in instructions and house rules, right on their phone. Stop sending the same text message every Friday afternoon.

copy.headline: They won't wait for a translation
copy.body: Speak their language from the very first click.

copy.headline: Tour Operators
copy.body: Meeting points. Weather policies. Answer the blockers upfront and watch the bookings close themselves.

copy.headline: Museums & Attractions
copy.body: Bag policies and ticket questions answered before they arrive at the gate. Smooth entry starts online.
